# Data Importing and Cleaning
```{r}
library(dplyr)

#Importing data
results <- read.csv("data/athlete_events.csv")

#Wrestling data
wrestling <- filter(results, Sport == "Wrestling") %>% na.omit()
```

# Top Wrestling Countries
```{r}
rankings <- summarize(group_by(wrestling, Team), Medals = count(wrestling$Medals, na.rm = TRUE))
```
